title: Trouble
body: Anybody else having trouble connecting to chat? I have an exellent network and i cant log on chat,What should i do

replies.body: This is currently a known issue that's being looked into!  Some players are having trouble connecting to chat, and we're keeping updates at our [service statu](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune)s page.  Hang tight until this gets fixed up!
Same here guys any resolution ? For how long will the problem persist ?
Same problem here I guess its only in Eune
